name: tsoam-church-management-system
description: Complete Church Management System for The Seed of Abraham Ministry (TSOAM)

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build-only
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.create-db: mysql -u root -p -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS tsoam_church_db CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci"
scripts.reset-db: mysql -u root -p -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS tsoam_church_db; CREATE DATABASE tsoam_church_db CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci" && npm run import-schema

author: TSOAM Development Team
